data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Persons, Scott W, Currie, Philip J., Erickson, Gregory M. (2019): An Older and Exceptionally Large Adult Specimen of Tyrannosaurus rex. The Anatomical Record 302: 1-17, DOI: https://doi.org/10.1002/ar.24118|18 occurrences
